definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence

sentences.english: They are located on opposite ends of the world, each with its own hegemony.
sentences.chinese: 他們是被處於世界兩級的強權國家。
超級大國正在玩弄強權政治。

sentences.english: It is today a factor in power politics in the West Asia region.
sentences.chinese: 如今在西亞地區，它是強權政治的一個因素。

sentences.english: In face of autocratic and political pressure, we will not be silent.
sentences.chinese: 面對強權和專制的各方壓力，我們不會噤若寒蟬。

sentences.english: The European Union is a monument to Europe's rejection of the old power politics.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟的成立標誌着歐洲唾棄了舊時的強權政治。

sentences.english: Truth in history is an interesting standard for great-power status.
sentences.chinese: 對於強權國家身份，忠實於歷史是個有趣的標準。

sentences.english: Hegemonism and power politics have new manifestations.
sentences.chinese: 霸權主義和強權政治有新的表現。

sentences.english: We cannot equate might with right.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能把強權視爲公理。
這是徹頭徹尾的強權政治。

sentences.english: It needed, Dediu said, someone with sufficient power to protect it.
sentences.chinese: 德丟說，這款新產品當時需要的是強權的保護。

sentences.english: Fair, in fact, than the Football Association of paternalism Feudal power and gross more important.
sentences.chinese: 公平，其實比足協的強權和封建家長式的粗暴更重要。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the rising and evils of power criminal law in highly political country.
sentences.chinese: 第一節介紹政治國家中強權刑法的興起及其弊端。

sentences.english: He said the days of big power politics when countries could be treated as chess pieces were over.
sentences.chinese: 他還稱國家間相互利用的強權政治時代已經過去。

sentences.english: Nakajima said. "All imperialist powers were part of the same gang to him."
sentences.chinese: 在他看來，所有帝國主義強權都是一丘之貉。

sentences.english: The powerful countries adopt double standards to fix intricate international issues.
sentences.chinese: 強權國家採取不公正的雙重標準操作複雜的國際問題。

sentences.english: To work for peace one must oppose hegemony and power politics .
sentences.chinese: 要爭取和平就必須反對霸權主義，反對強權政治。

definition: to rely on/to be dependent on
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
to close a country/to exclude foreign contact/closed country (Qing China, North Korea etc)
